task.title: ODBC drivers for Microsoft Access
task.shortdesc: Please follow these steps exactly. You will need administrator credentials to comoplete this task.

context.p: Installing the ODBC drivers as part of the SYSTEM DNS will allow all users of the computer access to these drivers.

steps.stepsection: From the Oracle Website download the basic instantclient 12_2 and the ODBC client. Add to 1 folder, Unzip, add to the root of C with all contents on the root of C with the label instantclient 12_2. Repeat for the 12_2nt version of the client.

step.cmd: Right Click on the ODBC.exe file and run.
